label.name: Joining the team for this course in MS Teams (igno...
label.intro:
Joining the team for this course in MS Teams (ignore if you already did this in Assignment #0)

You will need to join the team for this course in MS Teams.  For more details on how to do this do Assignment #0.  I am just posting information on it here to give another, quicker, way to get there.

To join the PHYS 1104 team, first open MS Teams (if you don't know how then do Assignment #0...).  

From the main page in Teams, which lists all of the Teams you are in, there is a button in the upper right corner that looks like this:

Click that.  It will present you with a few options.  One of them is to "Join a team with a code", which will look like this:

To join the PHYS 1104 team, enter this code in that box: c5fo4e1
